I'm Aniket. I love to code, listen to music and I even write free-verses at times. A majority of my work is writing syntax for design.

By Aniket Pant

I, Awake

Posted on 29 October 2011
Under poetry
Tweet

A dark cloud over the moon
Cold air surrounds me
I wish I could make the sun bleed
And still feel you beside me

Summer is long gone
My pen is still ever since
These words will be alive soon

We will walk in the rain
And get drenched in love

I wonder if my thoughts could reach you like letters
Brown paper and a heart
But no tear in your eye

If you call for me
I want to be there
I wish I could
I feel I will

I want to make the stars paint your name in the sky
Write all my words
I, awake

Hey, you just went through 108 words written by Aniket.

If you liked them, then you should definitely follow him on twitter too. He would be excited to know that you like his work.
